content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have prepared a New Joiner Checklist for you to guide you through the process of becoming part of our team. This checklist covers all the necessary steps you need to do starting from your first working day. Please study it and make sure all steps are taken.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\" https://kb.epam.com/display/GDOKB/New+Joiner+Checklist\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Joiner Checklist\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to mark this module as completed\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions regarding the Checklist, please contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Himani_Duggal@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Himani Duggal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Amulya_Khandavalli@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Amulya Khandavalli\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Nimisha_Nigam@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nimisha Nigam\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfaonboardingindia@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
